mapper.insert: insert into wf_instance_step (step_id, instance_id, step_name, type, order_no, step_type, is_last, status, super_id, next_id, deadline, isauto, rebut, begin_time, end_time ) values (#{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{instanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isLast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nextId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deadline,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isauto,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rebut,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update wf_instance_step
instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
step_type = #{stepType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_last = #{isLast,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
super_id = #{superId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
next_id = #{nextId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=BIGINT},
isauto = #{isauto,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rebut = #{rebut,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wf_instance_step set instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_type = #{stepType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_last = #{isLast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, super_id = #{superId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, next_id = #{nextId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deadline = #{deadline,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isauto = #{isauto,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rebut = #{rebut,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from wf_instance _instance left join wf_instance_step _step on _instance.instance_id=_step.instance_id left join wf_instance_user _user on _step.step_id=_user.step_id where _user.handler_id=#{handlerId};
